title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8113.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8113.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) US Route 9. The
northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 9 between IR 84 and Route 44/55, a distance of 13.5+- miles in the City of Poughkeepsie, the Villages of

Fishkill and Wappingers Falls and the Towns of Fishkill, Poughkeepsie and

Wappinger. (b) Route 44/55. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 44/55, including the Mid- Hudson

Bridge eastbound and westbound roadways between the Ulster county line and

Route 55; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the
hours of 6 p.m. and 6 a.m. and from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. in the City of

Poughkeepsie and the Town of Poughkeepsie. (c) Route 55. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 55 between Route 44/55 and the John Page Industrial Park in
the Town of Poughkeepsie and the Town of LaGrange. (d) Route 199. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 199, including the Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge, between the

Ulster county line and Route 9G, a distance of 2.0+- miles; provided, however, that the Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge shall not be used between the hours of 6:30
a.m. and 8:30 a.m., and between 3 p.m. and 6 p.m. in the Town of

Rhinebeck. (e) Route 9G. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 9G between Route 9 and Route 199
(Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge approach), a distance of 1.35+- miles in the Town
of Rhinebeck. (f) US Route 9. US
Route 9 between Route 9G and the Dutchess County/Columbia county line in the

Towns of Red Hook and Rhinebeck and Village of Red Hook. (g) Route 376. Route 376 between New

Hackensack Road, CR 104 and Route 113, a distance of 2.3+- miles in the Towns
of Poughkeepsie and Wappinger. (h) Route 113. Route 113 between US Route 9 and Route 376, a distance of 3+- miles
in the Town of Poughkeepsie. (i) US
Route 44. US Route 44 between US Route 44/Route 55 and Burnett Boulevard, a
distance of 0.4+- mile in the Town of Poughkeepsie. (j) Route 55. Route 55 between Route 22 (end
of overlap) and the Connecticut state line, a distance of 3.1+-
miles. (k) Route 22. Route 22
between Route 55 (end of overlap) and the Dutchess-Columbia county line, a
distance of 28.7+- miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8113.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
